server.ai.characters

Class AI

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.ai.characters.AI
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    B_Groot, B_JarJar, B_Trogdor

    public abstract class AI
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract AI object. Implements general methods needed by AI characters and defines needed abstract methods for operations.
    Author:
    Jonathan Sadler
